page.title: 06HOUSING AROUND TRURO
page.content: {THREEMILESTONE} ______________ The village of Threemilestone lies, as its name suggests, three miles the the west of Truro. Recent speculative housing developement there by the housing company Wimpy has resulted in a large private housing estate being built, but only a small part of the estate falls into our area. The houses on the estate are bulit with conventional bricks as opposed to the use of granite/cement blocks, covered with cement rendering. The usage of these granite/cement blocks for building is more usual throughout the county.
